## Shinny

```{r my_plot}
library(shiny)
shinyApp(
  ui = fluidPage(
  sliderInput("exponent",
              label="Exponent",
              min=1,
              max=10,
              value=2),
  plotOutput("my_plot")
  ),
  server = function(input, output){
    output$my_plot <- renderPlot(
      curve(x^input$exponent, from = -5, to = 5)
    )
  }
)
```
